description.en: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.ar: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.br: Um yukata é uma vestimenta Japonesa, um kimono casual de verão geralmente feito de algodão. Este é um conjunto masculino.
description.cns: 一种通常由棉质制成的夏季休闲和服。这种浴衣是为男性角色设计的。
description.fi: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.fil: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.id: Yukata adalah pakaian Jepang, kimono musim panas kasual yang biasanya terbuat dari katun. Pakaian yukata ini untuk karakter pria.
description.it: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.jp: 浴衣は日本の衣服で、通常は綿で作られたカジュアルな夏の着物です。
description.nl: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.pl: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.ru: Юката - летнее японское кимоно, сделанное из хлопковой ткани. Оно подчеркнет мужественность любого мадригальца.
description.sp: Un yukata es una prenda Japonesa, un kimono casual de verano generalmente hecho de algodón. Esta prenda yukata es para Personajes Masculinos.
description.sw: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. This yukata garment is for male characters.
description.th: ยูกาตะเป็นเสื้อผ้าญี่ปุ่น ซึ่งเป็นชุดกิโมโนฤดูร้อนแบบสบายๆ ที่มักทำจากผ้าฝ้าย ชุดยูกาตะนี้สำหรับตัวละครชาย
description.vi: Yukata là một loại quần áo của Nhật Bản, một loại kimono thông thường vào mùa hè thường được làm bằng cotton. Bộ quần áo yukata này dành cho các nhân vật nam.
